title: Polish: Help with Ogoneks
content:
Hello!

Simples question: what's wrong with these ogoneks?  
 [Gerusa Ogoneks](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718221324/http:/farm3.static.flickr.com/2538/3710140706_4fbe3cf871_o.jpg)

Thank you in advance.  
Cheers!
author: scannerlicker

comments.content:
The one on the e extends too far to the left for a start... I think the ogoneks would look better of they were narrower, and used the same angle as the end of the e (extending naturally back from this) - and this will also make it parallell with the bowl of the a?  
My 2 cents ;)
Roger is right; for more specific info, look at Twardoch's [Polish Diacritics: how to?](http://web.archive.org/web/20140718221324/http:/www.twardoch.com/download/polishhowto/ogonek.html)
